name: Skilrock Technologies
tag_list: game-technology, technology-solution-for-game-and-commercial-services, lottery-technology, online-casino, bingo, lotto, slot-games
overview:
Skilrock offers its technologies for lottery & casinos, POS terminal Solutions. It is a licensed gaming platform and is in online gaming business for a long time. SKilrock provides complete branded gaming sites for:

Lottery || Casino || Poker || Sports Betting || HTML5/Slot Games || Instant Win ||Facebook App Development

All the above come complete with the back office administrative software, payment gateways, customer support, hosting & database management.

Skilrock is spreading its network across various countries and running its lottery operations in different countries of 3 continents.

Skilrock has designed a central gaming platform-“Weaver” to handle various retail and interactive services. Weaver has been showcased in various International Gaming Shows and is appreciated for its innovation and adoption of latest technologies.

Weaver and Scratch Weaver are outstanding achievements of Skilrock, that are making instant ticket generation, scratch card printing, custom game reporting, managing winning claims and many such tedious tasks easy and manageable. The services can be availed by developing to established industries in gaming world.

offices.address1: C/o Sugal & Damani UK Ltd, KBC Harrow Exchange
